messages.content: Extract the legal description from this scanned text: Commencing at the northeast corner of Lot 5...
Commencing at the northeast corner of Lot 5, thence N 00° 00' 00" E 150 feet to an iron pin...
Identify the true Point of Beginning from the following text: Starting at the intersection of Duncan Drive and Main Street...
The true Point of Beginning is located at the iron pin set 200 feet south of the intersection.
List all bearings and distances from the provided text: From the northeast corner, thence N 45 00 00 E 100 feet to an iron pin...
Summarize the property boundary details from this text: Commencing at the northeast corner...
The property boundary extends 100 feet north, 200 feet east, then returns to the starting point.
Identify key points such as easements, right-of-ways, and iron pins in this text: Starting at the Point of Beginning at an iron pin...
Key features: Point of Beginning at iron pin, driveway easement east of 2006 Duncan Drive.
Reformat this legal description into standard format: Starting at the northeast corner of Lot 5...
Commencing at the northeast corner of Lot 5, thence N 00° 00' 00" E 150 feet...
Identify missing details from this legal description: Starting at the northeast corner of Lot 5, thence north...
Missing details: Distance for north direction, endpoint for next bearing.
Convert this non-standard format into proper legal format: N 00-00-00 E 150'
Identify all iron pin locations in this text: Beginning at the iron pin set at the southwest corner...
Iron pins: Southwest corner, northeast corner of Lot 5.
Fix common OCR substitutions in this text: N 45o 30| 15|| E 150.00 feet
Convert decimal bearings to DMS format: N 45.5083 E 150.00 feet
Extract bearings from text with mixed formats: North 45 degrees 30 minutes East 150 feet, then S45°30'E 200 feet
Standardize unit formats in this text: N 45-30-00 E 2 chains and 50 links
Extract bearings with reference monuments: N 45°30'E 150.00' to a fence post, thence S 30°15'E 200.00' to an iron pin
N 45° 30' 00" E 150.00 feet to a fence post, S 30° 15' 00" E 200.00 feet to an iron pin
Fix spacing and formatting issues: N45 30 15E150.00feet to an iron pin
N 45° 30' 15" E 150.00 feet to an iron pin
Convert various distance units: 2 chains and 50 links along the easterly line
165.00 feet along the easterly line
Extract bearings with cardinal directions: running in a Northeasterly direction N 45°30'15" E
Handle missing seconds in bearings: N 45° 30' E 150.00 feet
Fix OCR errors in special characters: N 45^ 30' 15" E 150.00 feet
Extract bearings with natural monuments: N 45°30'E 150.00' to a large oak tree, thence along the creek
N 45° 30' 00" E 150.00 feet to a large oak tree, thence following the meanders of the creek
Handle references to adjacent properties: thence along the Smith property line N 45°30'E 150.00'
N 45° 30' 00" E 150.00 feet along the Smith property line
Fix common degree symbol substitutions: N 45* 30' 15" E 150.00 feet
Handle multiple distance units in one description: 2 chains 50 links to a point, thence 150 feet to an iron pin
165.00 feet to a point, thence 150.00 feet to an iron pin
Extract bearings with fractional minutes: N 45°30-1/2'E 150.00 feet
Handle old style bearing notation: N 45-1/2 E 150.00 feet
Fix common quote mark errors in bearings: N 45° 30' 15'' E 150.00 feet
Handle bearings with implied zero values: North 45 East 150 feet
Extract bearings from paragraph format: Beginning at an iron pin, running thence North 45 degrees 30 minutes East a distance of 150 feet to a point
Handle right-of-way references: Along the right-of-way of Duncan Drive N 45°30'E 150.00'
N 45° 30' 00" E 150.00 feet along the right-of-way of Duncan Drive
